title: Parler Taken Down By Own Stupidity, Harry Styles Home Wrecker 1.14.21
itunes:title: Parler Taken Down By Own Stupidity, Harry Styles Home Wrecker 1.14.21
description:
In episode 791, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Danielle Radford to discuss the GOP's thoughts on the impeachment, Steve Doocy's thoughts on the attempted coup, the Parler app, Harry Styles and Olivia Wilde, Lord Of The Rings coming to Amazon, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Mitch McConnell’s Impeachment Endgame
  2. The significance of Liz Cheney’s and Mitch McConnell’s impeachment moves
  3. Jordan calls on Cheney to step down from House leadership
  4. Fox hosts spar during debate over comparisons between Capitol, Portland riots
  5. Amazon's shutdown of Parler is a threat to all small businesses
  6. As tech giants recoil from Trump and Parler, is free speech at risk?
  7. Amazon Says Parler Systematically Unwilling To Remove Violent Content
  8. These are the violent threats that made Amazon drop Parler
  9. Worried about free speech, FBI never issued intelligence bulletin about possible Capitol violence
  10. Amazon Will Suspend Hosting For Pro-Trump Social Network Parler
  11. How Parler went offline, and how it might come back
  12. Parler’s got a porn problem: Adult businesses target pro-Trump social network
  13. An Absurdly Basic Bug Let Anyone Grab All of Parler's Data
  14. The Hacker Who Archived Parler Explains How She Did It (and What Comes Next)
  15. I Refuse To Believe Harry Styles Is a Homewrecker, Sorry Jason Sudeikis!
  16. Amazon’s ‘The Lord of the Rings’ Series Has an Official Synopsis and You Can Read It Here
  17. (THREAD) Media has yet to do a deep dive on precisely what Trump *said* in his January 6 speech in DC—a speech now called an "incitement to insurrection," and the basis for an article of impeachment coming Monday. This thread unpacks the speech. I hope you'll read on and RETWEET.
  18. WATCH: Kaito Shoma - Scary Garry

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
